amendment.description: To express the sense of the Senate regarding prohibiting the use of funds to approve any exploration, development, or production plan for, or application for a permit to drill on, land in the southern California planning area of the outer Continental Shelf that is subject to certain leases.

vote.text: Amendment SA 110 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 110 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer. (consideration: CR S1431-1433; text: CR S1432) To express the sense of the Senate regarding prohibiting the use of funds to approve any exploration, development, or production plan for, or application for a permit to drill on, land in the southern California planning area of the outer Continental Shelf that is subject to certain leases.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 110 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 110 proposed by Senator Stevens for Senator Boxer.
